document_data.mainbody:
Peldan was a Cormyrean soldier who settled in Mistledale upon his retirement sometime in the 11 century DR.
Peldan settled in the western region of Mistledale, marking a piece of land with his helmet that would later become known as Peldans Helm. Peldans family grew over the years and a village sprouted up around his home. Many inhabitants of Peldans Helm in the 14 century DR claimed to be his ancestors.
